name: mfml-cli
description: The ICU MessageFormat + XML/HTML command-line interface.

scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && npm run rollup && npm run rollup-adapters
scripts.rollup-adapters: for p in $(ls ./lib/adapters); do rollup --exports default --external mfml-compiler --input ./lib/adapters/$p --file ./lib/adapters/$p --format cjs --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve || exit 1; done
